convertblocktype.confirmconvertcheckbox: I want to permanently remove these properties.
convertblocktype.converterrorsameproperty: A new property is mapped to more than one old property. New properties can only be mapped to one old property.
convertblocktype.haseffectonmirroring: Conversion of block types has an unpredictable effect on mirroring job ({0}). Mirroring for the mirroring job ({0}) may fail.
convertblocktype.heading: Convert Blocks
convertblocktype.info:
Converts one or several blocks in the tree structure from one block type to another block type.
Note! This operation is irreversible and content may be permanently removed.

log.clearcache: The cache is cleared for block {0}.
log.clearcacheall: The cache is cleared for all pages.
log.convertedpagetype: {0} block(s) of block type {1} were converted to block type {2}.
log.convertedpagetypetest: {0} block(s) of block type {1} would be converted to block type {2}.
log.heading: The following were affected for block {0} (including versions).
log.headingrecursive: The following were affected for block {0} (including versions of selected block type).
log.headingrecursivetest: The following would be affected for block {0} (including versions and subpages of selected block type).
log.headingtest: The following would be affected for block {0} (including versions).
log.noproperty: No properties of type {0} were found.
log.removeproperty: {0} property(ies) of type {1} were permanently removed.
log.removepropertytest: {0} property(ies) of type {1} would be permanently removed.
log.updateproperty: {0} property(ies) of type {1} were converted to type {2}.
log.updatepropertytest: {0} property(ies) of type {1} would be converted to type {2}.

convertblocktype.nomatchingpages: There are no subpages for the selected block type. The selected root page has page type {0}.
convertblocktype.noselectedpage: Select a page to convert from
convertblocktype.notmatchingpagetype: The chosen block type does not match the selected block. The selected block has block type {0}.
convertblocktype.recursive: Convert the selected block (of the selected block type)
convertblocktype.remotepage: Conversion for blocks is only supported for blocks served by local Episerver CMS database.
convertblocktype.removepropertywarning1: Make sure that none of the blocks to be converted are currently being edited.
convertblocktype.removepropertywarning2: All values for the properties that you select to remove permanently will be permanently removed from the database and cannot be recovered.
convertblocktype.removepropertywarningheading: This operation may damage the content on the website!
convertblocktype.requierdremovecomfirmation: Remove properties permanently must be selected to to continue
